testcase.name: DublinCoreVocabulary should be a Dublin Core OM vocabulary with a terminology-based solrizer
DublinCoreVocabulary should hold all the Dublin Core Core Elements
testcase.failure:
expected: ["oreal", "Forest", "bacteria", "fungi", "protist", "soil", "auxin"] got: ["Boreal", "Forest", "bacteria", "fungi", "protist", "soil", "auxin"]

expected: ["oreal", "Forest", "bacteria", "fungi", "protist", "soil", "auxin"] got: ["Boreal", "Forest", "bacteria", "fungi", "protist", "soil", "auxin"]
(compared using ==)

testcase.name: DublinCoreVocabulary should hold fields for admin and technical metadata (non-DC)
DublinCoreVocabulary should have the fields tagged for Solr indexing
